name: create_oas_application
description: Create a new application using an OpenAPI Specification (OAS) file or URL.

arguments.name: oas_url
arguments.description: URL that can fetch OAS content without authentication (optional if file_path provided)

arguments.name: file_path
arguments.description: Path to OAS file to upload (optional if oas_url provided)

name: create_graphql_application
description: Create a new application using a GraphQL SDL file or URL.

arguments.name: sdl_url
arguments.description: URL that can fetch GraphQL SDL content without authentication (optional if file_path provided)

arguments.name: file_path
arguments.description: Path to GraphQL SDL file to upload (optional if sdl_url provided)

name: create_postman_application
description: Create a new application using a Postman collection file or URL.

arguments.name: collection_url
arguments.description: URL that can fetch Postman collection content (optional)

arguments.name: file_path
arguments.description: Path to Postman collection file to upload (optional)

name: start_scan
description: Start a security scan for a specific application instance.

arguments.name: endpoint_ids
arguments.description: List of endpoint IDs to scan (optional, scans all if not provided)

arguments.name: scan_with_auth_id
arguments.description: Authentication ID to use for the scan (optional)

name: get_scan_details
description: Get details of a specific scan including status, results, and progress.

name: get_detections
description: Get security detections (findings) for an application instance.

arguments.name: include_metadata
arguments.description: Whether to include metadata in the response (default: True)

arguments.name: exclude_false_positives
arguments.description: Whether to exclude false positive detections (default: True)

name: get_detection_by_id
description: Get details of a specific security detection.

name: get_all_applications
description: Get a list of all applications (paginated).

arguments.name: next_token
arguments.description: Token for pagination to get the next batch of applications (optional)

name: get_application_by_id
description: Get details of a specific application by its ID.

name: get_owasp_coverage
description: Get OWASP coverage report for an application instance.
